dcterms:description: A dense and arbitrary-shaped text detection dataset, which collects commodity images with detailed descriptions of the commodities on small wrinkled packages. It contains 1038 training images and 500 testing images with polygon annotations at the text line level.
dcterms:title: DAST1500

dcterms:creator: Jun Tang
Zhibo Yang
Yongpan Wang
Qi Zheng
Yongchao Xu
Xiang Bai
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from DAST1500, created to test rotation robustness by rotating images and annotations in the test set of DAST1500 at specific angles.
dcterms:title: RotDAST

dcterms:creator: Cong Yao
Xiang Bai
Wenyu Liu
Yi Ma
Zhuowen Tu
dcterms:description: A multilingual dataset focusing on oriented text lines, consisting of 300 training images and 200 testing images, with large variations in text scale and orientation.
dcterms:title: MSRA-TD500

dcterms:creator: Dimosthenis Karatzas

dcterms:description: A multi-oriented text detection dataset that includes 1000 training images and 500 testing images, with text regions annotated using quadrilaterals.
dcterms:title: ICDAR2015

dcterms:creator: Yuliang Liu
Lianwen Jin
Shuaitao Zhang
Canjie Luo
Sheng Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1000 training images and 500 testing images, with 10751 text instances, including 3530 curved texts, annotated with 14-point polygons at the text line level.
dcterms:title: CTW1500

dcterms:creator: Chee Kheng Châ€™ng

dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset for scene text detection and recognition, containing 1255 training images and 300 testing images, with various text orientations including curved texts.
dcterms:title: Total-Text
